hero.title: Welcome to Sengani Girls School
hero.subtitle: Empowering young women through quality education and holistic development

introduction.title: Nurturing Excellence
introduction.description: Sengani Girls School is dedicated to providing a supportive and enriching environment where young women can develop their academic abilities, character, and leadership skills.

features.title: Excellence in Education
features.description: Our rigorous academic program prepares students for success in higher education and beyond.

features.title: Holistic Development
features.description: We focus on developing the whole person - intellectually, physically, emotionally, and socially.

features.title: Supportive Community
features.description: Our close-knit community provides a safe and nurturing environment for students to thrive.

testimonials.quote: Sengani Girls School provided me with the foundation and confidence to pursue my dreams.
testimonials.author: Priya M., Class of 2020

testimonials.quote: The teachers at Sengani truly care about each student's success and well-being.
testimonials.author: Lakshmi K., Class of 2018
